amendment.description: Amendment sought to require the Director of National Intelligence (DNI) to report to the House and Senate Intelligence panels on information it has regarding the human rights violations of the military government in Argentina; to include an appendix of declassified documents used for the report and to give the authority for the inclusion of a classified annex.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 112-75 to require the Director of National Intelligence (DNI) to report to the House and Senate Intelligence panels on information it has regarding the human rights violations of the military government in Argentina that resulted in 30,000 disappearances between the mid-1970's and mid-1980's. The amendment also seeks to help shed light on the unknown fate of hundreds of Argentine children who were born in captivity and distributed to members of the Argentine security forces.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hinchey amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 194 - 214 (Roll no. 325).
